author: theblock.co
title: Spot Ethereum ETFs pull in $240 million, beating Bitcoin ETFs’ $164 million daily inflows
description: Analysts attribute the inflows to positive regulatory discussions around DeFi and stablecoins, alongside a spillover effect from bitcoin.
content:
Analysts attribute the inflows to positive regulatory discussions around DeFi and stablecoins, alongside a spillover effect from bitcoin.
This story appeared on theblock.co, 2025-06-12 04:59:15.
